definition[0]: used to show that you are annoyed or disappointed
example[1]: Darn it! Iâ€™ll have to do it all myself!
definition[1]: used to emphasize how bad, stupid, unfair etc someone or something is
example[2]: The darn fool got lost on the way.
definition[2]: to repair a hole in a piece of clothing by stitching wool over it
example[3]: Her cardigan had been darned at the elbows.
definition[3]: a place where a hole in a piece of clothing has been repaired neatly with wool
